name: Gnomed
description:
One day you go to visit your pretty granny until you mistakenly drink a potion that shrinks you and makes you acquire new powers. Now that you are tiny, you will have to find the antidote by overcoming puzzles, transforming yourself into other enemies and acquiring their abilities. But that's not all, you can also change the dimension where you can find other useful objects in your adventure.

<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Features:

- 3D GAME

- PUZZLE / PLATFORM

-  4 LEVELS

- TRANSFORMATION

<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->
